body: I'm ok with accepting this for now to unbreak ONNX quickly, and I understand the case of `stride`, but it still would seem clearer for me if we didn't accept `None` for arbitrary arguments that have defaults
body_html: I'm ok with accepting this for now to unbreak ONNX quickly, and I understand the case of stride, but it still would seem clearer for me if we didn't accept None for arbitrary arguments that have defaults
